name: WalkThrough (roee3x)
description:
This is a small Demo for a project I'm working on Heavily inspired by "The Stanley Parable", the demo might be shot but if liked a full game will be released!

Also, all know bugs listed below or found by you will be fixed, as well as updating and adding new features to this demo over time.

Known Bugs & Issues:

- Player clips through some walls and invisible walls if walking towards them long enough
  (a bug in the engine)

- The "portal" Looks a bit dark and less smooth
   (*will be fixed with an update!)

- The narrator Clips might play together sometimes

If you find any other Bugs or Issues, or just a good idea for the full game!
Feel free to contact me!
Instagram: Roee_shkalim
Facebook: Roee shkalim (i dont use it as much)
Mail: devilboy998@gmail.com (yes, this is my embarrasing mail for the moment!)
